reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ICE Water 40z bottle
reviews.reviewText: Things I liked: The built quality of this bottle is excellent. From the price point it sells I can easily say it’s one of the cheapest available on an Amazon with the build quality it offers. I also liked the quality of the plastic components like the bottle spout and cap. One more thing to note is, since it’s insulated, if you like to drink lukewarm water instead of cold water, the water stays lukewarm for hours! This has been the favorite part for me especially in winter season.Things I didn’t like: Though the build quality of the cap and straw is good, the locking mechanism is a bit flimsy. It gives me a feeling that it might leak when kept flat on bed, this has not happened yet though so it could just be my perception.Overall, it’s a nice bottle with decent storage, helps me keep hydrated this winter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my new water bottle for the gym. It has everything I was looking for such as: the right capacity, keeps water cold over 24hours, has the straw with a soft sipper, and the handle is thick, sturdy and build onto the lid. Also appreciate the locking mechanism for when I don’t want to accidentally flip the sipper open when I’m refilling or carrying it around. It’s perfect!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good water bottle
reviews.reviewText: Anyone who pays $75 for a water bottle is crazy in my opinion. This water bottle works perfectly, keeps drinks ice cold all day long. It's cute and easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it minus two issues
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this bottle. It keeps ice all day, even in GA during the summer. Love the larger volume, color, and the way the straw screws in and never falls out(great design).My cons:1) the lock feature is finicky and needs some work. Despite being locked it will leak from the top on occasion.2) wish it was tapers at the bottom to fit in a cup holder so it didn’t roll all over the car.Having the option to buy replacement lids would be a plus too.Overall great purchase for the price. The straw/sip top is a plus to getting me to keep drinking throughout the day. I’ve tripled my water consumption since getting this bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It keeps everything cool for hours!
reviews.reviewText: I like the size and the fact that it really keeps everything cool. Don't have to use as much as ice as in other bottles. I like how tough it is. Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband Likes it for work
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle keeps my husband's water cold for quite a long time and it holds a lot of water m the lid can be a bit difficult to screw back on and you'll definitely want a long bottle scrubber and straw brush to clean it. But it's a great water bottle other wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: Keeps liquid cold. Nice rough texture for easy holding. Easy to drink. Lock works great. Colors look nice. Very good water bottle. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my ice water ICE COLD but needs new threads
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 4 different colors (one for each kid and me). I really loved all the color choices, so my kids wouldn't fight over whose bottle is who's.For the most part, I love this water bottle. When I fill my bottle with water and ice and the water will stay cold and the ice can last for 2 days with repeat refilling of water. Each bottle came with two (2) lids (one with a straw and the other not) and each lid has a handle. I have used both lids depending on my activity for the day. The straw lid has a lock mechanism, which works well and stays locked when wanted. It also has a push button to pop up the straw. The bottle also fits in my cup holders in my car. I love that.What I don't like is the threading on the lid to the bottle. Multiple times, while I was holding onto the handle of the lid, the bottom has just dropped out and fell to the ground. I was not running, walking hard, or any other super physical activity. It has even happened just when standing or pulling the bottle out from my cup holder in the car. It has happened on both lids too. Because of the threads, the bottle leaks as well, though not a hard fast leak. It seems to only happen when the bottle is laying down (with either lid). It does not leak when drinking from it (again with either lid).It also seems to dent fairly easily. All my kids have dropped theirs and now have dents. I have dropped mine too (as noted above) but still don't have any dents.
